attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is almost universal agreement as to the quality of this car (some poor souls do still value them). Only 69 mk2s were registered in the UK most of which have rusted away. We need to ensure the remainder are removed from our roads for everyones safety, the environment and also to make our roads a prettier place.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
